DEMO_VIDEO_1:
This is Luca's lap of Silverstone Historic - mostly the same layout but missing a few key chicanes from the Grand Prix version, so use it just for general familiarization!
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sipUje12rJ0[/youtube]
PREAMBLE: A first time visit for the SRF - the Grand Prix version of this famous British racetrack will provide a worthy challenge to novice and veteran SRF drivers alike. Silverstone features a variety of technical corners with some long straights for excellent drafting opportunities, and a final complex that can make-or-break your dash to the finish line.
